title: The Pathfinder: How to Choose or Change Your Career for a Lifetime of Satisfaction and Success
description: For the millions of people who are looking for the perfect job for them, "The Pathfinder" guides them through uncertainty and confusion, straight to the goal of selecting a final career direction. Through more than 100 self-tests, exercises, and other diagnostic tools, this guide helps readers uncover their natural aptitudes, major interests and values, and ultimate goals. Illustrations.
author: Nicholas Lore
